name: Little Magic
description: Little Magic is a Strategy game, developed and published by Data East, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: Minami no Shima ni Buta Ga Ita
description: Strange saturn game with a pig character.

name: Tales of the Shire
description: Welcome home, Hobbit! Live the cosy life of a Hobbit in the wonderfully serene landscape of the Shire. Discover, decorate, & share in this idyllic corner of Middle-earth. Join friendly Hobbits & familiar faces awaiting your arrival in Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game.

name: Diet Family
description: Diet Family is an "Unique! Fusion Shooting Game!!!", at least according to the advertising flyer. The game's official description for the Game Rating Board is more humble, it bluntly calls the game out a Galaga clone, which seems to be the more appropriate version. One or two players shoot cartoony enemies in front of abstract, non-scrolling backgrounds. It is possible, though, to move in all 4 directions, contrary to Galaga's restrictive horizontal only movement.

name: Gambler Jiko Chuushinha 2
description: Unrelated to the titles with the same name on the Sega CD and Super Famicom, this was a direct follow-up to the original Gambler Jiko Chuushinha on the original Famicom.

name: Gimme a Break: Shijou Saikyou no Quiz-ou Ketteisen
description: Gimme a Break: Shijou Saikyou no Quiz-ou Ketteisen is a quiz game released for the Famicom (NES) in Japan, and is based on an actual Japanese game show that aired from 1989 to 1992. Players can answer trivia questions against AI or human opponents, with the ultimate goal of challenging the game's Quiz King.

name: Gimme a Break: Shijou Saikyou no Quiz-ou Ketteisen 2
description:
Gimme A Break: Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen 2, released for the
Famicom in 1992, is the second game in a series by Yonezawa PR21 based on a
real Japanese game show. This game is significantly better than the first
game in the series, but also much harder. If you can't read Japanese very
fast and if you are not going to cheat using save states, then this game is
going to be a huge problem to beat. But it seems like a native Japanese
speaking person would find this game to be a lot of fun.

The game flow is the following. You choose a region of Japan that your
character lives in. Then you will compete in the regional quiz championships.
This is composed of a qualifying quiz that you have to get 10 questions right
to pass, then you compete against the other contestants from your region that
also passed the qualifying test. If you get first or second place, you will
move on to the national level of the game. Again, you must pass a qualifying
quiz. Then you will compete against the other contestants that made it this
far. Finally, the winner will compete against the Quiz King.

name: Great Deal
description: Similar to poker, your deck consists of the four different suits with values from 2 to ace, plus one joker card, so 53 cards in total. You don't hold them in your hand, though, but they fall down from the top of the screen into a play field 5 places wide and 5 places high, filling the bottom first. And your job is to arrange them into combinations such that they disappear and do not fill up the screen.

name: Hanafuda Yuukyou Den: Nagarebana Oryuu
description: Hanafuda Yuukyou Den: Nagarebana Oryuu is a logical game with elements of erotic images. Naturally, you will see them only after victory. Hanafuda is a style of Japanese playing cards used to play a variety of games. Hanafuda translates to 'flower cards'. The name also refers to some games played with the cards.

name: Leisurely Brick
description: This is a leisurely brick game, the control of this game is to use the mouse to control the reflector to move for the reflection ball to attack the bricks, this game belongs to a casual game, the store in the game has a lot of strengthening content to improve the game experience

name: Megalothymia: Mokusei Zettai Bouei-ken - Heaven's Fall
description: This is a space fleet shooting game that can be easily enjoyed with FPS-like controls.

name: Chaos Metaverse
description: free, there will dance, will send skills of beauty and hero butler, there is a character special effects system, there is a dressing system, skin system, and MMO-style shooting, lobby chat, friends system, equipment system, props system, leaderboard system, view the results

name: Honoo no Toukyuuji: Dodge Danpei
description: Hono no Toukyuji: Dodge Danpei is a Sports game, developed and published by SunSoft, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Hell Hawks Over the Bulge Campaign
description: History books called them the "Hell Hawks", the USAAF called them as the 365th Fighter Group, the Germans called them a terror.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Lisunov Li-2 Collector Plane
description: Li-2 was a Soviet C-47 sibling armed to the teeth.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Ten Days of Autumn Campaign
description: This campaign shows the actions of 3./JG 52 it the end of October 1941.

name: CrabMania
description: CrabMania is a competitive Party Game of between two and four simultaneous players.Each player controls a character, and must eliminate each other using a throwable object according each level.

name: Cardfight!!: Additional Card Set Vol.6 [D-BT09] - Dragontree Invasion
description: Unlock cards from [D-BT09]: Dragontree Invasion.The booster pack will be added to the in-game shop, and included cards will be available for crafting.

name: Honshougi: Naitou 9 Dan Shougi Hiden
description: This game lets players play the Japanese board game Shōgi. Shōgi is a game that is played in a similar way as chess. Players take turns moving their pieces in a strategic manner with the main goal of capturing their opponents pieces and putting their opponents king piece into checkmate. The game features several different game modes. These different game modes offer different opponent difficultly levels, timed games, and also some which let the computer player make the first move instead of the player.

name: Bulanci: Hero Factory
description: The Hero Factory, where you can choose the right pattern and colour for your Bulanci. You can highlight the nature of your killer pillow with sunglasses, an eyepatch, a baseball cap, or leather gloves, to name but a few.

name: Bulanci: Map Pack
description: Have you played some maps too much? No worries! Before you can create your own battlefields in the editor, we've prepared another pack of sophisticated battle arenas for Deathmatch and Capture The Flag for you. This will certainly keep you busy for a time.

name: Tiny Whaley
description: Embark on an exciting 2D adventure under the ocean! In this puzzle-heavy game, where we manage a magical and unusual whale, we not only overcome obstacles by jumping, but also create our own path by positioning your dead bodies at the right points.

name: Vae Victis: Khan
description: Conquest and seduction, sexual dominance and fiefdom management; Forging an empire is a brutal business where you must balance the needs of your budding Khaganate with your own desires. In this revenge story meets an empire simulator, the risks are high but the bounties are heavenly...

name: Unfated
description: An immersive post-apocalyptic MMO. Survive, resist and conquer in a world ravaged by ancient invaders. Form alliances, traverse diverse terrains, and reclaim humanity's destiny with Unreal Engine 5's breathtaking graphics and Chat GPT 4 natural language.

name: The Seven Realms: Realm 3 - High Lathión
description: The Seven Realms is a fantasy, story-driven, adult visual novel where your choices will shape the fate of the Realms and the people around you. Will you be a Fair or a Strong Ruler? Will fate be enough for you, or will you want more? The choices are yours to make.

name: The Red Forest
description: Play as Yaro, an introverted young adult who's forced to explore the mysterious and bizarre Red Forest after his brother gets dragged into its depths by a sinister creature.

name: The Foretold: Exordium
description: Embark on an ancient Egyptian odyssey in this prequel to the gothic horror card game, The Foretold: Westmark Legacy. Build your deck, collect relics, and wield items to conquer creatures and bosses lurking in Egypt's shadows.

name: Titan Survival
description: Titan Survival is a survival roguelike where you pilot a powerful flying mech with the task of defending the last city on earth. Engage in fast paced aerial combat, use your enhanced reflexes to outmaneuver your enemies and create unique and powerful builds each time you play.

name: The Night of Erosion: Prequel
description: 'I', an ordinary high school student, turns into a monster every night after a certain incident. The protagonist struggles to find out why he became a monster and at the same time avoid being restrained. Please join this girl on her journey toward truth.

name: Vox Populi: Poland 2023
description: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for the Polish parliamentary election of 2023! In "Vox Populi: Poland 2023", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Wanted Shadows
description: Decimate thousands of demons on All Hallows' Eve to protect your infernal home. Wanted Shadows is a bullet heaven roguelite where the difference between overpowering and being overpowered lies in your skill and wit.

name: Welly Wang VR
description: Use VR for what it was invented for, chucking things and hitting other things. Welly Wang VR is an eclectic mix of fair ground style challenges, mixed with off the wall random levels testing your skill and accuracy.

name: Tale of the Shadow World
description: Walking through the forest, the girl found an interesting book, after reading which her world turned upside down for a while. And maybe forever. The shadow flowers gently whispered to her, luring her further into the darkness. Will she be able to bear the moral of this tale?

name: Temple Knight Saga: Oath of the Knight's Sword
description: The story of the Three Temple Knights, dispatched on a secret mission, and takes place .Along the way, Sir Virginio accepted a request from a certain lady. But what truly awaits him. JRPG Quality. Translated with help from native English speaker, and not machine translation.

name: Super Jump Guys
description: "Super Jump Guys": Whimsical platformer inspired by "Only Up!" Ascend through quirky, stacked levels, mastering gravity-defying jumps while dodging hazards. How fast can you reach the summit and claim your name on the SJG Leaderboard's

name: Surveillance
description: Surveillance is a psychological horror in which you have to prevent high paranormal activity In different places around the world. Identify suspicious changes in environment and take immediate action!

name: Sushi Battle Rambunctiously
description: "Sushi Battle Rambunctiously" is a comical physics-based action battle royale party game where appetizing sushi, created by combining various types of 'shari' and 'tane', engages in fierce combat alongside zombified sushi to survive until the end.

name: Sex With Toys
description: Sex With Toys is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Scars of Mars
description: Scars of Mars is a new real-time RPG. During combat and exploration, time flows, so you must make split-second decisions, execute precise commands swiftly, and vanquish enemies within a limited time. It's a thrilling experience that captures the unique tension and satisfaction of the gameplay.

name: SpaceRace
description: Futuristic 3d racing game where players compete to set the best time on visually striking tracks.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Club Crazy
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Party down with these Night Club themed tables!

name: Nixie
description: Nixie is a 2D story-driven exploration game about a robot's search for a missing human lost in an android space colony. Slash, fling, and glide your way through an eclectic world, while enjoying colorful 16-bit pixel art and an infectious soundtrack!

name: Paradise's Secrets
description: After accepting the invitation from the Paradise company following the events we've experienced, nothing on our journey may turn out as we expect. You must be very careful to uncover all the mystery and reveal the truth. Learn everything and expose the true face of the Paradise company

name: One Button Run
description: Press the button to reach your destination!

name: Office Overtime
description: That soulless office job you hate? It hates you too, playing video games during work hours was your fault. Catch up on overdue work before morning. Coffee is your best friend.

name: Dungeon Croaker
description: Dungeon Croaker is a frog themed turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler. Navigate randomly generated dungeon floors, find and synergize relic effects, fight enemies with unique abilities, avoid dangerous environmental hazards, and defeat powerful dungeon bosses.

name: Project;Hypatios
description: Project;Hypatios is an FPS game inspired by Portal where Aldrich was cursed with a time-loop ability and must escape from Mobius Corps' Hypatios Lab by shooting his way through the chambers.

name: Radio Silent
description: You're a marine that just latched onto a ship that went radio silent for 10 years after entering a wormhole in space. Battle hoards of aliens, upgrade your arsenal, and collect audio logs to discover the chilling history of the ship you've boarded.

name: Ride 5: King of the Hills Pack
description: With RIDE 5 - King of the Hills Pack you'll have the ideal bikes available to let loose to the max on Stelvio's hairpins!

name: RiBeat!
description: RiBeat! is a challenging rhythm game. Hop with the beat of the music while avoiding obstacles and solving puzzles. Play as Muira, the frog deity, and dive into the world of rhythm, puzzles, and catchy music!

name: Hidden Western Frontier Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden Prototype Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden Boxes
description: In Hidden Boxes, players are divided into two different teams: seekers and props. Seekers try to find props before time runs out.

name: History of Space
description: History of Space is an immersive and educational game that allows players to explore a virtual space history museum, delving into the captivating history of space exploration.

name: Maraka
description: Maraka is an action dungeon-crawler that features physics based combat. Delve into a procedurally generated cave system on an alien planet. Harness the power of magnets and the environment to wield as your weapon: defeat opponents by physically manipulating objects and the enemy itself.

name: Lum's Game
description: Live an idyllic life growing a garden with your family, and taking care of their strange pet! Life is perfect, except for these strange dreams you keep having...

name: Lost Recall
description: Puzzle game with the addition of skill-based elements. Move, push the objects, solve puzzles, and uncover new mechanics. Use unique abilities of the robots, which will allow you to unlock the next levels.

name: Little Splash
description: Little Splash is a 2D precision platformer inspired by the classics you love. Here you play as an agile protagonist who will splash paint all over your path, are you ready to make the cleanest run possible?

name: Leap Hero
description: The princess has been captured! Step into the armored boots of a frog and use your tongue as a grappling hook to beat challenging levels. Encounter quirky characters and dive into this thrilling rescue mission.

name: Late Night Cleaning Simulator
description: Take on the task of cleaning different businesses, but avoid breaking too many items in the buildings otherwise your boss will not be happy.

name: Metaball: Starter Pack
description: 7 Legendary Outfits, 1 Stamp, 1 Emote, 2 Style Slots, 2 Perk Pages, and up to 30 Beam Shards! This Starter Pack is a great value! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss it!

name: Mow That Lawn
description: Action-packed sidescrolling gardening-shooter, with colorful comicbook-style graffics and gameplay inspired by the arcade-machines of the early 80's. Mow that lawn, jump over the holes and don't let piles of dirt, animals, drones-with-water-balloons or mischievous friends, get in your way.

name: Moose Miners
description: Take control of a mining operation run by moose. They mine and sell the gems. You need to decide where to spend the profits. Hire more miners and upgrade their gear. Buy new rails and minecarts to get deeper into the mine. The deeper you get the more valuable gems you will find.

name: Model Railway Millionaire
description: Model railway builder with economy simulation. Edit the terrain, build the track, and place all the highly detailed objects to create exciting model railway layouts! Deliver food and row materials to the cities to earn money and expand your world! Be a model railway millionaire!

name: Evade VR
description: Evade VR is a unique arcade game in which you have to take the battle in outer space. You will have to fight the bots, dodging their shots and meteor showers. In battle you will help, an extensive arsenal of weapons, abilities and bonuses, combine them and earn as many points as possible.

name: Elementary Trolleyology
description: Elementary Trolleyology is a game about your first (and only) day working at SciPhi, the world's leader in ethical alignment. You will work on a secretive project developing a "morality module" for an advanced AI. Every decision you will make means the difference between life and death for others.

name: Dropkick Navvy
description: Dropkick Navvy is a physics-based crafting/survival sim. Scurry, gather, and build, to help your pal the World Tree reassemble a broken cosmos. Which broke all on its own, totally at random, and no one in particular was responsible.

name: Drinkrime
description: Jin, a talking liquor bottle with supernatural powers, has given you a mission. Face DRINKRIME's cast of unique characters and force them to confess their crimes. Interrogate them together and make those wrongdoers come to terms with their guilt!

name: Divemensions
description: Divemensions is a 2D Puzzle Platformer.... just that the levels are not actually 2D! In this game you'll need to move between the layers of the world to overcome various challenges! Get ready to solve puzzles by understanding the 3D layout of the levels or create your own with the level editor!

name: Disaster Golf
description: Disaster Golf is a new, fast-paced take on golf that requires you to react on the fly. Experiment with many combinations of natural disasters to navigate the golf ball through wild and diverse courses as fast as you can!

name: Fuel's & Friends
description: Fuel's & Friends is a first person horror shoppkeeper simulator game. Investigate an dead relative old computer to find it's secrets. Upgrade and explore the shop to expand your business !

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Steampunk Costume Pack
description: The sequel to the captivating tale of Fuga: Melodies of Steel has arrived! This turn-based RPG is back with a ramped up battle system for more strategy, as well as a brand new event system that gives you more thrilling choices to affect your experience!

name: Guardian Untold
description: Guardian Untold is a top-down, defense adventure with 1-2 player co-op. Gather resources, restore your village, and stand against the creatures lurking within the Unknown.

name: Heaven Attack!
description: Gabriel comes to wake up Michael sleeping in his room in heaven. It's my turn to look around today. Let's start before Metatron gets angry.

name: Hell God
description: The developers describe its content like this: Hell God contains violence, blood and gore. It can produce scares in some circumstances.

name: Car Detailing Simulator VR
description: In Car Detailing Simulator VR, you have the power to renew and restore cars to its former glory, catering to the demands of your discerning customers. Transform neglected vehicles into stunning and well-maintained machines that can be the envy of all.

name: Cosmic Panic
description: Arcade style party game for one to four players. Top the highscore charts in a variety of game types in top-down, platforming, and 3D third person perspectives. Play with friends local couch-party style or online with steam remote play.

name: Challenge Tour
description: This is a casual little game!

name: Chain Drop
description: A fast-paced puzzle game for match lovers

name: Chain
description: Chain is an open world 2d action adventure game inspired by the gameboy era. you will have to explore a vast island with different biomes in search of the seven magical petals, but be careful, the island is under a curse that mixes all the items inside the chests.

name: Coreless
description: Coreless is a roguelike action game blending deep RPG customization elements, set in a sci-fi world. Craft your unique playstyle through a rich system of avatars, protocols, augmenters, and traits, as you tackle challenging bosses in this action-packed adventure.

name: Crafty County
description: A captivating city-building puzzle game, blending strategy with creativity as you help towns by merging groups of four buildings into unique structures to make them grow and prosper.

name: Crypt Survivor
description: Descend into alien crypts, collect vital crystals, and battle hostile extraterrestrial creatures in this gripping sci-fi survival shooter. Your mission: save your species and unearth the secrets hidden in the depths.

name: Defendor
description: Defendor is a throwback to the fast paced arcade games of the 80s.A retro style, arcade shooter where you upgrade your base to increase the capabilities of your ship, unlock new weapons, ships and cause more mayhem.Defend your base until everyone makes it into the escape ship.

name: Deceived by the Host
description: A slice of life RPG. Hiroshi Kawada’s third year as a college student is as hectic as it can be. He’s trying to secure a job for the sake of his beloved girlfriend, Nanami Miyasaka. Experience romance and drama in a modern Japanese setting.

name: Deathwatchers
description: Deathwatchers is a 4 player online co-op 'spot the difference' style, psychological horror. Use the equipment at your disposal to locate & log as many events as possible. Build your ritual and try to cleanse the locations of any demonic threats. An incorrect ritual and you may never leave.

name: Cryptfall
description: In this 1-4 Player Co-Op game, gather resources, fight fierce enemies, and craft essential tools in a dynamic island adventure. Race against time to survive as an ancient evil awakens in just 10 days!"

name: Archer Hero
description: Take aim, and let your arrow fly in this randomly generated, top-down rogue-like. Choose your path wisely, as you traverse the mysterious isles that lay before you... Plenty of loot and hardships await.

name: Anticitizen: Red
description: Use bullet time, a variety of movement mechanics and an improvised arsenal to outwit and outgun biker gangs and corporate police in an American-occupied cyberpunk Australia. Meet a unique cast of Aussie battlers, delve into the lore of the new American empire, and stay for the larrikin charm.

name: And the Hero Was Never Seen Again
description: After defeating the Demon King, the Hero Astel is affected by a magic that turns him into a woman, and resets her powers. Now she must retrain her powers when the "true demons" begin to appear once more.

name: Absolute Color Perception
description: Absolute color sense is a very test of color sense eye game. Among the many colors, can you tell which one is different?

name: Astarian Adventures
description: Embark on a cosmic visual novel adventure on a male-absent planet. Navigate choices that shape your destiny, form bonds with alien females, and determine the future of the Astarian race. Will you be their savior or downfall? Dive into "Astarian Adventures" and forge your path.

name: Buriedbornes 2
description: "The oldest and most abhorrent Prophecy has become reality. This is endless and merciless warfare for Buriedbornes, army can revive forever." The long-awaited sequel to the easy-to-play turn-based dungeon RPG series is finally here!

name: Buddy and Friends on Halloween
description: Halloween's here, and Buddy the cat and pals are set for 'tricks or treats' in the neighbourhood. But as they venture into the unknown, will compassion and kindness triumph over fear? Join these kittens in a heartwarming Halloween tale in this beautifully illustrated jigsaw puzzle game.

name: Brewing Haus
description: Brew your legacy and explore an inviting world as you create and expand your business. Embark on a serene beer brewing journey in this relaxing simulation game. Discover new recipes, expand, and master the art of brewing.

name: Balling Up
description: Immerse yourself in a colorful journey through universes that does not forgive any mistakes. Jump well in the ball parkour game, where falling can cost you everything!

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Thomas Built Buses Bus Pack
description: Back to school, again! The Thomas Built Bus Pack is here to expand your school bus fleet with a well-crafted and iconic new model. Get your hands on the Saf-T-Liner C2 as well as four new interior designs for you to customize your buses.

name: Carball 360
description: A game of carball where the last team to touch the ball scores the goal. An AI named Vicky is there to fill the void when friends are unavailable. Light, simple, competitive.

name: Byle
description: Fight through a corrupted city, battling over 50 unique enemies and powerful bosses. Arm yourself with an arsenal of weapons and uncover mysterious power-ups as you strive to liberate the city from the clutches of the mind-altering BYLE.

name: Call Sign is Magic Liner
description: Call Sign is Magic Liner is an old school Shmup with a new twist. You can strategically draw lines and defeat your enemies.

name: Karaoke Studio Senyou Cassette Vol. 1
description: Karaoke Studio Senyou Cassette Top Hit 20 Vol. 1 is the first add-on for the Karaoke video game Karaoke Studio, featuring twenty additional songs. It cannot be played without the original cartridge and microphone peripheral. All the game modes themselves remain unchanged.

name: Karaoke Studio Senyou Cassette Vol. 2
description: Karaoke Studio Senyou Cassette Top Hit 20 Vol. 2 is the second add-on for the Karaoke video game Karaoke Studio, featuring twenty additional songs. It cannot be played without the original cartridge and microphone peripheral. All the game modes themselves remain unchanged.

name: Super Rugby
description: Super Rugby is a rugby game released for the Famicom by ZAP and TSS. Though it shares its name with the Super Rugby international rugby union, the latter was formed years after this game's release so the name is coincidental. It is also not to be confused with the 1994 Super Famicom game Super Rugby. The game uses a top-down perspective of the pitch with the two sides oriented vertically, and the player is able to assign points to various stats before playing a match to focus on certain areas of their playstyle. Options include a one-off "Training" exhibition match, a "League" game which pits the player against several CPU teams, and a "Vs." mode for two human players to compete.

name: Parasol Henbee
description: This game is based on the Anime series of the same name and was released only in Japan for the Nintendo Famicom. Not to be confused with the Game Boy title of the same name.

name: Puzslot
description: Sin descripción

name: Shikinjou
description: Shikinjou, or Shikinjoh, is a puzzle game inspired by Mahjong Solitaire and Sokoban. Like most Mahjong Solitaire variants, it takes its name from a region in China: in this case, the former Imperial Palace of China, also known as The Forbidden City. The goal of the game is to get the protagonist, who is a jiang shi by default, to the exit. To do this they must push mahjong tiles out of the way. Most mahjong tiles will disappear once they touch one or more of the same type, and these tiles will also vanish along with it. Some, like the dragon or wind tiles, are barricades that will transform any tile that comes into contact into another barricade. The player can also switch graphical modes, which changes all the tiles, the protagonist, and even the background and UI. These graphical modes include alternative themes like space, medieval knights, and Japanese ninja (with shogi tiles replacing the mahjong tiles).

name: Elevation II
description: PD Amiga game.

name: Resident Evil 2: Kendo's Cut - Uncut
description: Sequel to the mod to the original Kendo's Cut, this time following Claire as she deals with the ramifications of Robert Kendo surviving the zombie attack on his gun store.

description: Futuristic racing game.

description: Pick up passengers and follow the arrow to their destination. For bigger tips complete the journey in the quickest time possible!

description: Net Yaroze game.

name: Hardwire
description: Net Yaroze game.

name: Databugs
description: Net Yaroze game.

description: Innovative polygonal 3D action game.

name: Phosphor
description: Phosphor is a first-person shooter that uses Adobe Shockwave Player to run within your web browser.

description:
Embark on a sky-high adventure with veteran Joe in the "Fly me to the Moon" bundle.

description: One could certainly say that the Club does "slay" in their formal attire. Serve looks with The High Stakes Club pack. Includes 3 Outfits, 3 Back Blings, 3 Pickaxes and 3 Wraps.

description: Go around the circle dodge the bullets and collect diamonds to increase your score!

name: Arcade Archives: Strike Gunner
description:
"STRIKE GUNNER" is a shooter released by ATHENA in 1991.
Manipulate the "S.T.G. Strike Gunner" and challenge the aliens to a battle to recapture the earth!
Select from a total of 10 weapon unit types to find one for each stage, with each weapon unit usable for one stage only.

name: Samsara Agent
description: "Samsara Agent"is a dark apocalyptic action Roguelite game. You will play the role of a survivor of the apocalypse, carrying a unique skill and inheriting the power of the Starry Kings, just like opening a system to enter the apocalypse, bringing a glimmer of peace to this apocalypse!

name: Warriors of Freedom
description: Old schooled turn based tactics game. Pick your hero, gather up your army and fight for your freedom. You have to decide carefully as you have finite amount of everything. Prove your value.

name: Wind Ryder
description: A comedy, romantic dating sim, masquerading as an adventure RPG.

name: Wizard Cats Tank Battle
description: Choose from seven classes and fight other Wizard Cats in Wizard Cats Tank Battle, a cross-platform multiplayer game inspired by both classic arena shooters and MMORPGs!

name: Wizardry Level C
description: The discovery of an old magic book turns your life upside down. Will you succeed in becoming a guild wizard—or will you travel a different path?

name: Youlogic
description: Indie logic puzzle game

name: Zonescape
description: You wake up in one of the prison cells. By chance, you end up with a key in your pocket that you can use to open your door. Escape from the most secure prison in the world!

name: Way to the Light
description: You are a real digger, having descended down a vertical shaft of a mine, you find yourself in an abandoned tunnel system.

name: Under Pressure
description: What happens when you make a VR game only about Pressure Washers? From cleaning any object imaginable, playing soccer or volleyball up to flying - Under Pressure is a multiplayer playground that’s all around what you can do with a power washer in your hands.

name: Usurper
description: A turn-based roguelike deckbuilder where your King is your strongest weapon. Play cards from your deck to drop units onto the battlefield and checkmate your opponent. Build your Deck, Upgrade your Ruler, and Claim the Throne!

name: Visco Collection
description: With the Visco Collection, you'll have the chance to relive the glory days of arcade gaming with these seven fantastic titles. Whether you're a fan of shooters, fighters, sports, or racing games, there's something here for everyone.

name: Twilight Array
description: A narrative-driven sci-fi exploration game that sees a couple being torn apart by invisible forces whilst trying to salvage an abandoned spaceship and uncover its mysteries.

name: Town of Sins
description: Battle card game with a unique battle system. Seduce every girl in the city and turn her into a fighting whore. Train your cards with new strikes. Fight with other players. Go through adventures and events to collect the most beautiful and strongest bitches.

name: Tomboy: Love in Hot Forge
description: Tomboy: Love in Hot Forge is a medieval VN about guy who was left on the street without money. Bridgid is a blacksmith girl who invited you to spend the night at her house. Find out what difficulties you will face and how your relationship will develop.

name: The Stormy Islands
description: Survive mother nature, prepare for the different seasons protecting yourself from cold, heat, hunger and thirst. Beware of Tornadoes, Storms, Tsunamis and predatory animals, on a variety of islands where each one will have to adapt to its limited resources.

name: Puppet Master: Full Moon Toys - Totem & Mephisto Skins
description: After years of experiments, Andre Toulon has created puppets that want to play with you! Play the game in style with skins inspired by the hot 90s action figure toy line. Includes skins for Totem Sutekh and Mephisto!

name: Robot
description: This is a role-playing adventure puzzle game, a wonderful and unfamiliar world that requires thinking in order to continue moving forward, exploring the wonders of this game, overcoming various difficulties, and experiencing magical experiences.

name: Rusty Rabbit
description: Millennia after humanity abandoned the planet, rabbits claimed their place... Stamp, a cute bunny with an old soul, pilots his trusty mech "Junkster" through the giant ruins of a frozen world in this 2.5D action belt scroller.

name: Sentinel: Stones of Disruption
description: Sentinel: Stones of Disruption is a pulse-pounding sci-fi roguelike shoot'em up on a remote planet. Step into the metal shoes of a powerful robot on a mission to reclaim a stolen crystal from alien adversaries. Restoring this gem is crucial to bringing harmony back to a shattered world.

name: JumpMan
description: ATTENTION: This game is nearly impossible to beat! A challenge only made for the strong-willed gamers out there and should not be taken lightly. You take control of a ball named Gaton. Prove yourself to Ludwig and complete all nine challenges. You'll then be qualified to partake in real missions.

name: Dark Zone
description: Immerse in an infected world. As a soldier, seek the truth of a zombie epidemic. Explore dark landscapes, uncover secrets, and fight for survival. Unravel the origin before it's too late. Ready to face the truth?

name: Eviction
description: Eviction is a horror puzzle game where you must uncover the story of a family that was devastated by a mutant virus. Play through 6 unique levels and unlock new endings combinations to find new content! Once you are finished you can check out the multiplayer version where you team up to battle foes!

name: Escapen't
description: YOU CANNOT ESCAPE - I made sure of that. Solve puzzles, gather clues, don’t crawl into ventilation shafts, and realize how trapped you are in this comedy-horror escape room, my magnum opus.

name: Escape Him.
description: You're not alone, in this labyrinth of hallways. However, whatever that thing is, it's not human.

name: Earl vs. the Mutants
description: Play as Earl, a mutant exterminator, in this top-down driving rogue-lite. Navigate a post-apocalyptic wasteland, mowing down hordes of mutants while fulfilling your mission to save humanity.

name: Drift.Wav
description: Drift.Wav is a casual drifting game with a synthwave inspired aesthetic. This game is not meant to replicate / simulate actual drift mechanics, but more serve as a fun & relaxing game where you can slide in a synthwave inspired world. See if you can drift your way to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Diceomancer
description: Diceomancer is a roguelike deck-building game. Despite aspiring to live a peaceful life, fate forced you to embark on an adventure. Make the most of your deck and dice in a world filled with swords, magic, and guns, all to restore the tranquility you once knew!

name: Dice Assassin
description: Dice Assassin is a challenging game where you defeat enemies on the board according to the dice numbers. Choose attacks using cards, position yourself strategically to overcome enemies on the board, and devise tactics using action cards.

name: Debtors' Club
description: Be the tax collector of a shady city hall in this narrative-driven resource management game. Talk to debtors, manage a team, make difficult choices, and challenge the city's moral decay. It's their money, but it's your job.

name: Com__et
description: A queer visual novel about being locked into a path, and having _______ words hidden from You. Find Your way to discover what's missing and reach Your ____ End.

name: Conflict of Lords
description: Conflict of Lords is an Roguelite Anti-TD game. You will act as the Lord of Foe in Game Development Council, who decided to go his separate way due to a conflict. Invade the newly released game Village Guardian. Summon the Predators to destroy villages. Try your best to overthrow the Overlord!

name: Conqueror of Time
description: Conqueror Of Time is a traditional dungeon crawl rogue game with a time travel theme. Choose a character from different time periods and fight your way through dungeons using various items from different times and spaces. Use time travel abilities to fight alongside your past or future self.

name: The Spirits of Whispermoon
description: Embark on an unforgettable co-op adventure in The Spirits of Whispermoon. Team up with friends to jump into a world of magic and mystery, full of intricate puzzles, treacherous dungeons, and fearsome foes.

name: The Last Martian
description: The only survivor. The Last Martian. Unite 10 civilizations against an invincible enemy. Fight for the right to life of the last people in the universe, during 20 hours of storyline. Author's Uroboros Universum. A game unlike any other.

name: The Lab Thing
description: The lab thing is a first-person survival horror game. Explore a mysterious secret lab and play as the only human left alive. Gather all the scientist's notes about the monster, upgrade backpack items, record information and try to escape before you join the body collection of the lab thing!

name: Tasty Jigsaw: Happy Hour 4
description: Incredibly appetising dishes for every taste! From juicy and colourful fruits to flavourful grilled steaks. And for dessert we will offer sweet culinary masterpieces and, of course, unusual soft drinks and tart coffee without limit!

name: That Damn Goat
description: A chaotic multiplayer party game where the world, and your character, is constantly changing. Battle to keep control of the crown all while That Damn Goat does everything in its (omnipotent) power to get in the way.

name: The Big Lez Video Game
description: Choose between battle royale, deathmatch, infected and free roam mode and play with your friends as some of the main Big Lez Show characters! Use each characters specific special ability to assist you during combat and create your preferred weapon loadout to play optimally. Beware of the Choomahs!

name: Tactics Below
description: Tactics Below is a turn-based strategy roguelike where you assemble a party of 4 characters and conquer challenging waves of diverse enemies. Unlock new skills, upgrade your characters and create distinct synergies each time you play.

name: Survival Dead Poly
description: Survival Dead Poly is contains almost everything you need to survival and have an adventure games.Good luck on your journey!

name: Storage Hustle
description: Storage Hustle is a Simulation RPG where you go into storage auctions to buy different mysterious storages. Discover and sell many items, join Yard Sales and haggle your way for profit!

name: Spider Mall!
description: A night of urban exploration goes wrong for Explorer X as he finds himself trapped in an abandoned shopping mall facing off against security guards and a giant hungry spider. You make the choices in this live action bodycam FMV game. Escape the mall or die trying!

name: Space Shooter 24
description: Join the war in the depths of space with Space Shooter 24! Customizable ships, realistic graphics, and breathtaking action await you. Take action now to save the galaxy.

name: Small Aircraft
description: This is a classic flying shooting game with exquisite and simple graphics.

name: Shard Seekers
description: Shard Seekers is a 3rd person shooter rogue-like dungeon-crawler where players command elemental golems through a mechanical, crystal-laden dungeon that changes with each run.

name: Story Time
description: Turn based Strategy game focused on multiplayer. Choose 9 characters, battle your friends, build levels, share them.the player with the most characters after 20 turns wins.

name: Pure Badminton
description: Pure Badminton is the most realistic Badminton simulation game.Experience the sensations of badminton, in a fast, technical and strategical game.

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2024
description: Welcome to Pro Basketball Manager 2024 - the best basketball management experience, offering unparalleled depth and authenticity across 160+ elite basketball competitions. Show the world you're the ultimate basketball manager!

name: Past Memos
description: "The game Past Memos is a game set in three different time periods, containing puzzles and mysteries. It aims to blend its features with a narrative to provide players with a beautiful experience. You must unravel the mystery in different time periods to shed light on the future."

name: Paper Bride 5 Two Lifetimes
description: "Paper Bride 5 Two Lifetimes" is the 5th work in the "Paper Bride' series. Our cast from Zangling Village return to the stage to welcome players back to the world of paper bride...

name: No Vacancy Tonight
description: Imagine waking up trapped in an abandoned motel. When you manage to get out of the room, a phone rings in the distance... In this point & click adventure game in 3D, you will have to use your wit to solve puzzles and find out what happened.

name: Kem Alpha 1
description: You get a call to go to your friend's house, but then things start to take a horrible turn....

name: Letifer
description: Take on the demonic threat as Letifer and gun your way through different Rituals. Choose from a diverse pool of upgrades to create your ultimate build and then own it! Bring the fruits of your labour back to your base and make lasting upgrades to your character and gear.

name: Lily in Puzzle World
description: Explore a sketchbook world in a casual mix of platforming and brainteasing puzzles!

name: Luna's Tale
description: Help Luna in collecting coins, defeating enemies, overcoming hurdles and exploring huge worlds in saving her forest from the evil forces in this classic 3d platformer.

name: Megaquarium: Deep Freeze
description: Unite the deep ocean's abyssal species and polar favourites such as Adélie Penguins and Seals in this two-for-one expansion! Deep Freeze combines complex new care requirements, new decorative options and a 5 level campaign into Megaquarium's most ambitious expansion yet!

name: Metaball: Diamond Bundle
description: 7 Epic Outfits, 1 Stamp, 1 Emote, 1 Metapass Premium, 1000 Metanium, 30 Beamshards, and more! Get the Diamond Bundle at an affordable price! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss it!

name: Metaball: Gold Bundle
description: 8 rare outfits, 1 stamp, 1 emote, 500 Metanium, 30 beam shards, and more! The Gold Bundle is a great value! Don't miss out on this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!

name: Millennia
description: Create your own nation in Millennia, a historical turn-based 4X game that challenges your strategic prowess across 10,000 years of history, from the dawn of humanity to our possible futures.

name: Mr. Semmel
description: Mister Semmel is a 2D platformer in which precision and speed are required. Can you manage to pass each level within the given time? Can you beat your own records?

name: Multiplayer Drone Simulator
description: Take part in breathtaking drone simulation in a realistic city with Multiplayer Drone Simulator! Enjoy the freedom in free mode, test your skills in levels, and drive drones with players worldwide.

name: Nightlife Tycoon
description: Nightlife Tycoon is a bar management game, where you have to build your dream bar and make it thrive. Hire staff, take care of customers, organize incredible events and become the king of nightlife!

name: NeonPowerUp!
description: Save a city overrun by robots. Save a dystopian futuristic city overrun by mad robots

name: Neon Fantasy: Cats
description: Neon Fantasy: Cats is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Fall Valley
description: Step into the breathtaking world of Fall Valley, where the vibrant hues of autumn await your discovery. Immerse yourself in a serene, orange-colored wonderland as you embark on a soul-soothing journey through this stunning valley.

name: Filly Astray
description: A platforming adventure game with a new take on combos, dare you adventure into the world of Filly Astray and face the monsters and mayhem within?!

name: Forza Motorsport: Car Pass
description: Expand your Forza Motorsport garage with 30 extra cars at one low price!

name: Forza Motorsport: Race Day Car Pack
description: Race Day Car Pack features 8, new-to-Forza cars built exclusively for the racetrack!

name: Kardashev
description: Kardashev is a first-person, space set, open world, factory building game.

name: Idle Blocks
description: Idle clicker game with simple but really addictive gameplay. Destroy endless blocks and proceed as far as you can. Complex prestige system and upgrades with endless possibilities and pure fun

name: House of Legacy
description: Early autumn, as rebel forces breached the city walls, you found yourself at the helm of your surviving kin, embarking on an arduous journey. Seeking refuge in the last bastion of unyielding hope, a county seat untarnished by the chaos, you ignited the flames of a nascent dynasty.

name: Heroes of the Ashenwatch
description: Heroes of the Ashenwatch is a challenging CO-OP Action RPG where up to 5 players team up to defeat the hordes of evil.

name: Gorfest
description: Discover an intense post-apocalyptic survival FPS, with a thrilling story. Scavenge the island for food, ammo, weapons and fuel while fighting off hordes of zombies in a massive open world. Keep your hunger and thirst in check, and be prepared to repair vehicles when needed. It's time to survive!

name: Internet Cafe Mini Games 10 in 1
description: Imagine an internet cafe that contains 10 fun little games. You can play any game you want in this internet cafe. Try to get the highest score in simple games by managing your character with a single button.

name: Goodbye Seoul: Itaewon
description: In the face of global destruction. Rayon pursues government's secret project for space evacuation. "Goodbye Seoul : Itaewon" is a puzzle adventure game that neutralize enemies and overcomes the environment in a city with various dangers.

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Explore "Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles" and experience the mesmerizing beauty of our world from above. Solve captivating puzzles while discovering Earth's wonders in stunning aerial views. Unleash your inner explorer!

name: Cat Attack
description: JRPG similar to Final Fantasy/Lufia with an overworld and a variety of dungeons. Many party members with unique skills/abilities. Not early access, but will be updated in the future based on user input and other information.

name: Clown Art
description: "Escape from Clown Art in a terrifying horror game. Solve puzzles and escape the nightmarish mansion before it captures you."

name: Choice Clash: What Would You Rather?
description: Experience a world of choices in this ultimate decision-making game with 300 mind-bending dilemmas. Your path, your destiny awaits! And You What Would You Rather? Be invisible for a day or Be able to fly for a day? Your Choice matter!

name: At the Edge of the World
description: A lone fisherman sits at the edge of the world. Something stirs inside of him. It wants to be fed.

name: Born In Reverie
description: Experience Dani and the Guardians' story as they defend their home from the Beasts. Delve deep into the mountains to fight the beastly scourge, explore Dani's peculiar dreams, and discover the reason to keep moving forward.

name: Boxman
description: A friend in need and the fate of multiple worlds sitting on one small cardboard box’s tiny shoulders, luckily this box came with a hero inside and a lot of packing peanuts! Join BOX as they jump, grab and swing across multiple chapters all in the name of friendship!

name: Carachnophobia
description: Step into a galaxy not far far away, where an alien race plotting the end of mankind discovered a spectacular creature that has the potential to create the necessary chaos. There is only one problem; it is not very intelligent and requires some training!

name: Case of the Mysterious Death of Keiko Haraeda
description: Japan, September 12, 1999, at 8:00 p.m., Ms. Keiko Haraeda collapsed in her room and was found dead. Although the police have ruled that there is no case and closed the investigation, many puzzling points remain, and the family is still calling for information.

name: Bombastic Land
description: Blast your way through dungeons in a Rogue-Lite Retro style, fighting slimes and bosses! Expand your home, populate the land, take care of your garden, go fishing with bombs and race your Kart until the wheels fall off!

name: Build Master: MarsVille
description: Build Master: MarsVille is a city-building and strategy game that invites you to create your Martian colony with your engineering genius and building skills. Form alliances, trade resources, and conquer rival colonies. Embrace the challenge and become the ultimate Build Master on Mars!

name: Armchair Commander
description: A turn-based strategy game where you can experience historical campaigns or explore your own historical scenarios and those created by others in the mapping community.

name: Digitris
description: In the best tradition of the worlwide known Russian puzzle game, Digitris will test your agility and dexterity. Align digits so their sum equals a target sum that increases at each level, making the game increasingly difficult.

name: Encore Rally
description: Survive against the RALLY of aliens. Need an ENCORE?

name: Samurai: Japan Warrior Fighter
description: Samurai: Japan Warrior Fighter is an exhilarating action-adventure game that immerses players in the captivating world of feudal Japan. Assume the role of a young and determined samurai on a quest to master the art of the katana.

name: Rogue Cards
description: Roguelite deckbuilder with unique graveyard and monster mechanics set in a medieval randomized world

name: Project Maverick
description:
People Can Fly, the team behind games such as Gears of War: Judgement and Outriders, shared on Wednesday that the company has entered an agreement with Microsoft to develop a new video game based on a work-for-hire contract. The game, codenamed Project Maverick, is based on the "intellectual property rights owned by the publisher" and will be developed with a budget of $30-50 million.

Little else is known at this time. People Can Fly has expanded significantly in the last couple of years, growing with multiple studios around the world with seven games currently in development across over 600 staff.

name: AC Milan Club Football
description:
Club Football is a soccer series designed to re-create the individual team experience. A total of 17 games released in the Club Football series are tailored to the specific European teams on which they are based, including character facial mapping from each of the 22 position players on the roster.

Each game features bespoke content - including media archive clips of great goals and famous victories - and allows fans to add themselves to the 2003/04 starting line-up of their favourite side.

name: Borussia Dortmund Club Football 2005
description: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

description:

A new game mode: "Proving Grounds". Take on challenging missions with unique modifiers.
New loadout system with random- and favorite-loadout options
All previous expansions (A New Hell, Masters of the Galaxy, Turning Up The Heat and Democracy Strikes Back).

Community-driven galactic campaign.
A universe of worlds to liberate.
100+ hours of gameplay

name: Free Fall
description: 2D action game, developed by Color Dreams. The game was never released, remaining only in the prototype phase. However, independent companies released it in 2010 (National Games Depot - NDG, The NES Dump) and Piko Interactive released it again in 2017. Released exclusively for NES. You control a hand who must catch falling things and then throw them back up to safety.

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Overbearing and Preppy Girl Maid GP-02

name: CD Battle: Hikari no Yuushitachi
description: CD Battle is a game for two players that prompts each of them to insert an audio CD into the console in order to generate a party of three characters for each player, which then engage in a turn-based battle. The characters belong to different classes (warrior, mage, ninja, etc.) and have different parameters and special attacks. Despite the game's visual similarity to contemporary Final Fantasy games, it has no true role-playing elements and consists entirely of battles.

name: The Dark House
description:
Spooky lights, strange noises have been heard by walkers passing by an old unused house. What is causing this usual activity?
Tom is determined to find out, along with a slightly reluctant Jen!
Join Tom and Jen as they go on an exciting adventure right on their doorstep.
What will happen on the adventure? You decide!

name: Real Fighter
description: Korean DOS fighting game in 3D.

name: Streets of Slender-Man
description:
Embark on a Bone-Chilling Journey in 'Streets of Slender-Man' — A Survival Horror Thriller.

Dive into the Heart of Terror: Unleash your inner thrill-seeker in the vast, eerie expanse of 'Streets of Slender-Man.' This is not just another game; it's an immersive experience where every shadow whispers danger, and every corner conceals the unknown.

name: The Legend of Robin Hood
description: This game was in the final stages before release. At this vital time Kevin Costner's movie, Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves was released. But Arcadia didn't have the funds to obtain licensing from both Nintendo and the movie, so they were forced to pull out. The game itself is an action RPG and it shows the life of all the Merry-Men.

name: Super Kart Racer
description: Super Kart Racer is an old-school isometric karting game. Enjoy high-speed racing along with many other game modes to keep things fresh.

name: Poppy Birds
description: A mobile puzzle game.

name: I Am Level
description:
Flick, bounce, and roll your character through the bizarre yet stylish world of ‘I Am Level’ in this original mix of pinball and platform game.
Tilt your device to get the ball rolling, then tap or hold anywhere on the screen to fire off pinball bumpers, springs, and doors. Clear the screens to unlock more of the map, and level up your player to unlock new costumes.

name: SMW The Crown Tale
description: Sin descripción

name: Guitar Star
description: A plug-and-play console designed to capitalize on the boom of games like Guitar Hero and Rock Band, manufactured and released sometime in 2009. It contains licensed MIDI versions of various rock songs like 'Dream Police' (Cheap Trick) and 'Thriller' (Fall Out Boy), and four modes from which to play them in. It has garnered a reputation for being a rather poor representation of the 'guitar game' subtype, often pointing to the lackluster covers and low production quality.

name: Happy Game/Pilgrims
description:
Physical bundle exclusive to Super Rare Games.

Contents:
Game cartridge containing Happy Game and Pilgrims
Reversible cover
Full-color manual
2 stickers
2 sets of 3 random trading cards for each game

name: Idol Shooter
description:
Idol Shooter is an archery game that shoots swords towards fixed or moving targets.
Gameplay can be done by tapping the screen and then releasing it.
Idol Shooter provides a variety of backgrounds and targets with endless gameplay.

name: Evhacon
description:
Assume the role of an unknown hero charged with aiding the Aecherians on a epic quest steeped in mystery and high adventure!
In typical RPG fashion you’ll go on quests, fight monsters and level up your character.
Enhance your attributes and talents as you see fit to achieve the playing style that most fits your playing style.

name: Black Touch '96
description:
Black Touch 96 is a 2D urban themed beat 'em-up game that puts players in the shoes of a muscled guy. The plot involves in what appears to be a kidnapping of a young woman by a gang of criminals. The player is off to save her.

Gameplay includes 2.5D sidescrolling and beating up enemies with various kick and punch attacks. Along the way items can be found that replenish health among other things. Enemies include various weird street scum and bosses. The game can be played solo or with a friend. The second player takes control of a mysterious guy wearing a robe and straw hat.

name: Minesweeper

name: SAS: Zombie Assualt 2
description: Zombies are everywhere and your mission is to survive their attacks and kill them all. The only protection from the monsters are the barricades you have to repair.

name: Bomb Boat
description: Cute maze game with a yellow blob.

name: Helldivers: Defenders Pack
description:
Helldiver Defenders are the unmovable objects of humanity, capable of holding their ground in any situation. They have a bulkier look and a helmet reminiscent of the knights of Old Earth and used to double as riot police before humanity unified properly.

• The Defender Uniform, a cosmetic helmet, armor, and cape.
• CR-9 ‘Suppressor’: A semi-automatic rifle firing small fragmentation grenades. It is a volatile weapon but capable of devastating large masses of enemies, hence the nickname ‘Suppressor’.
• AD-334 ‘Guard Dog’: A backpack drone system, featuring an automated defensive combat drone armed with a small submachinegun. The drone circles ahead, firing at targets of opportunity and will land in the backpack to reload.

name: Hyper! Danganronpa H20: Abandon All Hope
description: 16 teenagers find themselves trapped in the underwater basement of Freedom Academy, a school for Super High School Level Students that excel in their individual fields. They are told that the only way to escape is to participate in a deadly game where the victor is set free, and the losers face fatal defeat.

name: Helldivers: Support Pack
description:
Support Helldivers are much loved by their squad mates and bring both firepower and medical aid to any squad they join. Wearing the classic grey cape with a black cross they project an aura of capable concern for fellow humans.

• The Support Uniform, a cosmetic helmet, armor, and cape.
• LAS-16 ‘Sickle’: A carbine based on laser technology, modified to behave more as a regular assault rifle. It overheats quickly but well placed shots do excellent damage and the virtually unlimited ammunition is invaluable in tight situations.
• AD-289 ‘Angel’: A backpack drone system, with an automated healing and repair drone that will try to help all friendly targets in its vicinity. It will land in the backpack to refill the restorative substance.

name: Helldivers: Turning Up the Heat
description:
Helldivers: Turning Up The Heat is a free content update for HELLDIVERS accompanied by the release of the Reinforcements 2 DLC.

Free Expansion Features:
Increased rank cap from 25 to 27.
6 new trophies.
New environment: Volcanic planets, full of dangers.
New Bug type: The Bug Impaler
New Cyborg enemy: The Cyborg Hound
New Illuminate enemy: The Illuminate Obelisk
Three new objective types: Repair and Fire Artillery, Disarm Unexploded Ordnance, and Geological Survey.
New customization outfit: The Volcanic Camouflage set.
New perk: Strong Arm, allowing you to throw further.

Similar to Antaresian Reliquary, this WAD features a new weapon and a whole smorgasbord of monsters and props via Extended DeHackEd.

name: Portal Panic
