description: Go Hell Go: Tsukiotoshiteko is an upcoming new RPG by Entergram.

name: Panic Road
description: A pinball game with multiple flippers and a vertically scrolling playfield. The playfield is an outdoor forest area, the sides of the playfield are tree stumps, the bumpers are walking mushrooms, etc.

name: They Hunger: Episode 1
description:
The first part of a horror oriented total conversion mod for Half-Life made as a promotional game for PC Gamer.
After a nasty car crash, you search for help only to find that monsters have taken over the area. you have to run and fight through graveyards, sewers, a swamp and even a volcano all in an effort to make it to the radio station in order to call for help.

name: They Hunger 2: Rest in Pieces
description: The second part of a horror oriented total conversion mod for Half-Life made as a promotional game for PC Gamer.

name: They Hunger 3: Rude Awakening
description: The third and final part of a horror oriented total conversion mod for Half-Life made as a promotional game for PC Gamer.

name: Custom Mech Wars: EDF Collab Edition
description:
CUSTOM MECH WARS EARTH DEFENSE FORCE COLLAB EDITION is a special luxury edition that includes the main game and collaborative content with the EARTH DEFENSE FORCE series.

The collaboration content includes 10 additional missions. the EDF mech part sets: Barga, Balam, Nix, Combat Wagon and EMC along with accessories from the EDF emblem set.

name: Custom Mech Wars: Ultimate Edition
description:
CUSTOM MECH WARS ULTIMATE EDITION is a large and luxurious edition that includes the main game and "Earth Defense Forces" series collaboration contents, as well as a total of 70 anime game collaboration accessory parts and a custom voice that allows users to change the navigation AI voice to a special version.

The EDF collaboration content includes 10 additional missions. the EDF mech part sets: Barga, Balam, Nix, Combat Wagon and EMC along with accessories from the EDF emblem set.

The anime collaboration content includes heroine camouflage and decal accessories with 7 from SAMURAI MAIDEN, 8 from BULLET GIRLS, 7 from OMEGA LABYRINTH and 13 from DREAM C CLUB along with the custom voice options Enthusiastic voiced by Nobuyuki Hiyama, Young Lady voiced by Kikuko Inoue , Rich Lady voiced by Hekiru Shiina and Berserker voiced by Tomoko Kaneda.

name: Bowser's Valley
description: This is a Super Mario World ROM hack done in the style of Super Mario Bros. 3, with some visuals and audio borrowed from other games. The story is similar to those found in other Mario games, with the princess being kidnapped by Bowser and taken to his island named Bowser's Valley, and it being up to Mario to rescue her.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2
description: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 tells the story of what happened to the voxel Earth after the events of the first installment. It cleverly introduces elements from Earth Defense Force 6 and features the Wing Diver Shooter, who didn’t make it into the previous game. This latest installment is filled with more love for the Earth Defense Force series (and Earth!) than ever before!

name: Happy Birthday Pavera
description: A birthday map for Pavera. Fun Fact: October 17th is not his birthday

name: Nie no Hakoniwa: Dollhouse of Offerings
description: "Let us celebrate, the birth of this nightmare." A story about an urban legend surrounding a certain "Box", this is a Japanese-style, supernatural visual novel about madness, love and hate.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Silver Moveset
description: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Silver Moveset is a custom mod that adds in Silver the Hedgehog from the Sonic series into Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. The mod adds a completely original moveset for the character, 7 unique costumes, custom UI and new voice clips for the character,

name: TrollLab
description: Discarded and abandoned, you embody an outcast escaping fate. Discover a pathway to a hidden underground troll facility. A series of challenging trolls and discoveries await. A road to the truth calls from the void.

name: Airport Run
description: Airport Run is a browser game included in the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Drift Boss
description: Drift Boss is a game included in the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Fruit Blade
description: Fruit Blade is an action game that is included in the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Office Hurdles
description: Office Hurdles is a browser-based mobile game playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Koala Sling
description: Koala Sling is an arcade mobile-browser game that is playable on the Singpore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Snake Challenge
description: Snake Challenge is a mobile browser game that is playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment package.

name: Starship Defender
description: Starship Defender is a browser-based space shooter game for mobile devices that is playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Grab the Sushi
description: Grab the Sushi is a puzzle game that is playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Wordler
description: Wordler is a word puzzle game that is playable on the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment package. The game is a clone of the browser game Wordle.

name: Up for Grabs
description: Up for Grabs is a 1 - 4 player word game. A spinning cube in the center of the screen continuously brings up new letters. Each player has a board in the corner of the screen, and players can pick up letters as they appear in the cube, with each letter able to go to only 1 player. Letters can be rearranged on the individual 4 x 4 boards to spell words horizontally and vertically, but the cube keeps spinning and other players can obtain new letters during this time. Gameplay is divided into 4 quarters, and during intermissions unwanted letters can be discarded. The final score is tallied at the end of the game based upon all words on the board minus the value of unused letters. There are 4 levels of gameplay.

name: Sangokushi Taisen: Battle of Three Kingdoms
description:
KAI SANGOKUSHI TAISEN - Battle of Three Kingdoms - is a military card battle game set in the world of the arcade version of SANGOKUSHI TAISEN.

As part of the 'Volunteer Army' aiming to unify China, players will travel across the land, recruit warlords, and engage in epic battles.

name: 1001 Jigsaw Detective 3
description: An exciting and suspenseful adventure in the world of detectives. Assemble the puzzles and enjoy the colorful and exciting pictures.

name: Revolgear II Ver.D Revision+Ex
description: Arranged installment of REVOLGEAR II -SECOND BRIGHTNESS-.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki FC Evolution - Chara-Ani Limited Box
description:
The CharaAni Limited Box includes:
• The game
• Everyone Assemble! Falcom Academy FC DVD
• Trails in the Sky FC genuine leather accessory case
• Sora no Kiseki First Chapter Evolution Archives (Estelle version)
• Sora no Kiseki First Chapter Evolution Archives (Joshua version)
• 5 rubber character straps for Estelle, Joshua, Tita, Agate, and Scherazard in the set

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki FC Evolution - Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition includes:
• The game
• Everyone Assemble! Falcom Academy FC DVD
• Sora no Kiseki First Chapter Evolution Archives (Joshua version)

name: Five Nights with Mac Tonight
description: Five Nights with Mac Tonight is a fan-made Five Nights at Freddy's game made by Photo Negative Mickey, Lampz and ThatOneWankEngine.

name: Abandon: The Town
description:
A Source 2013 mod with a focus on gunplay over puzzles or story. Weapons feel better, enemies are a lot tougher, and the player can no longer quick save to try and cheese their way through situations. Play this if you're looking for a mod that actually makes some changes to the game rather than just a pack of maps set in the Half Life universe, but be sure to expect a challenge!

The mod is basically 100% focused on combat and is in some ways more of a proof of concept than a full game. So in other words there isn't really a story to speak of and it ends a bit abruptly. That being said more content is in development and everything I'm developing in this will be put to use in future work so look forward to that.

I'm currently very open to any assistance from experienced developers. I have very specific goals in mind so if you're looking for a project that isn't going to wander into the unrealistic territory that kills a lot of mods, this is it.

name: Antlions Everywhere
description: You are Carter Grok, get out of mine, find the squad and reach whole City-S

name: Frogmaster
description: Frogmaster is a soccer game for one to four players. The players control tadpoles on the pitch, which react to joystick input which act as rewards. The player must train the tadpoles to score goals by reaching the other side of the pitch. Added challenge is generated by walls on the pitch and evolving tadpoles into frogs which can lay eggs and eat other tadpoles. In the original Mainframe version there were only frogs.

name: Sentimental Journey
description:
Sentimental Graffiti is the name of a popular dating simulation series by NEC Interchannel. A TV anime based on the series was later produced, titled Sentimental Journey. Sentimental Journey is a collection of twelve short stories about twelve different girls. Though unrelated, there is one common theme that binds the episodes together: each girl's bittersweet experience of first love.

In this Playstation game the player can choose a girl (or 4 of them if there are 4 players to play) and let her find the love during a board game. There are different boys to meet and different mini games and special blocs to make the game more interesting.

name: 1001 Jigsaw. 6 Magic Elements
description: 1001 Jigsaw – the opportunity to relax from the hustle and bustle in jigsaws.

name: The Invasion 2
description:
The Invasion 2 is a Super Mario Brothers X Episode that was created by Redigit.

Unlike the original Invasion, it has only 7 bonus levels as opposed to 12 and adds the "Star Palace", an area with many bonus items for the player to collect if they have enough Stars. It also introduces names for worlds and map warps.

name: MiniGame Show do Milhão
description: Sin descripción

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Ice Age
description: Winter puzzles in 500 high quality images.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Forelli Redemption
description: 2001. The events are taking place at the same time as those of Grand Theft Auto III's original story. Giovanni Forelli, 26 years old, is the son of Sonny Forelli, also the nephew of the current Forelli patriarch, Giorgio. He was lucky enough to survive the destruction of Little Italy during 1998. The Forelli Family is weak these days, though it still manages to stay in the game. However, a short chain of events and a bit of luck gives the Forellis a chance to restore their power…

name: Guildford Castle VR
description: Guildford Castle is a free roaming, narrative VR experience with light interactivity.

name: Otaku Puzzle!
description: A 3D top-down puzzle game with any image, GIF, video allowed, plus multiplayer.

name: My Little Pony: Super Luna Game DX
description: My Little Pony: Super Luna Game DX is a Super Mario World rom hack made for the 2022 Pony Dev Jam on the MLP Forums. The game is based on the Luna Game creepypasta series of games and heavily features the character Princess Luna.

name: Sonar
description: Sonar is a cancelled game for the Atari 2600. A prototype of the game was dumped on AtariProtos.com in March 2023.

name: Tasty Jigsaw: Happy Hour
description: Tasty Jigsaw Happy Hour - is an exciting puzzle game and a fantastic opportunity to try tasty treats without leaving the house!. Assemble jigsaws from a multitude of pieces and learn the history in 500 high-quality photos.

name: Sudoku
description: In 2008, a game of Sudoku was released on the Amstrad CPC by Cronosoft.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki SC Kai - HD Edition
description: A remaster of the PSP version of the second installment in the series, serving as a direct sequel to the events of the previous installment, with enhanced graphics, cross-save with the PSP version and extras like PS3 themes, music, calendars and more. The game follows Estelle sets out to a new adventure, after completing some training by the Bracer Guild to prepare for that adventure.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Chuu
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Chuu is a remake of the original sound novels with updated art and backgrounds.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki SC Evolution - Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition includes:
• The game
• Falcom Academy SC DVD
• Sora no Kiseki Second Chapter Evolution Archives

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki SC Evolution - Chara-Ani Limited Box
description:
The CharaAni Limited Box includes:
• The game
• Falcom Academy SC DVD
• Trails in the Sky FC genuine leather accessory case
• Sora no Kiseki Second Chapter Evolution Archives
• 5 rubber character straps for Estelle, Joshua, Olivier, Kloe, and Renne

name: Petpet Park
description: Sin descripción

name: Trail Out: Luxury Life
description:
Experience the world of luxury with these expensive cars!

Surge Mc1 - is a rare British luxury sports car. Fast, expensive and crashes beautifully.

MASK X100 - A fully electric car. Luxurious design, quality build and optional autopilot.

Limonator II - Mr. President's personal limousine. Armored, heavy, and holding the brand.
As well as a bonus appearance of the main character.

name: Creatures
description: Creatures is an innovative music tech game that combines the excitement of a TPS-style Battle Royale with a surreal atmosphere and exclusive music from top artists. Choose from a variety of unique characters and explore landscapes filled with hidden weapons and hiding spots. Play as different characters and traverse different spaces as you engage in thrilling battles.

name: Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition
description:
Super Freaks 1 Ultimate Edition is a 2D platformer featuring single player and up to four player drop-in/drop-out cooperative gameplay.
Go to the right, jump on enemy heads, reach the exit, all of that standard stuff. When you select a level, you can choose between any of the Super Freaks before playing, as well as a whole host of other unlockable characters. There are over 20 characters total!

name: The Leviathan's Fantasy
description: This is a Simulation game. You will manage your cloud city, recruit adventurers all over the world, take them for exploration, obtain resources and blueprints. Construct buildings, make equipment, produce items, so to develop your city into greatness together with your adventurers.

name: Phasmophobia: Ascension
description: This massive update includes an all new progression system, introduces equipment upgrades for every item in the game, overhauls the game's tutorial, and moves the whole experience to a new branch of the Unity engine for improved overall performance in game.

name: Happy
description: Happy" is a psychological horror adventure game where you play as a detective investigating the disappearance of a family in an abandoned winter forest.

name: Art Reborn: Painting Connoisseur
description: Dear curator, you are about to embark on a journey to captivate the audience! You will be in charge of an art gallery.Impress the museum curators around the world with these masterpieces, collect badges, apply for support funds, and learn the value of art!

name: Mimic
description: You are a mother, your child needs you. Something evil is lurking outside. Be a good mother. Don't let it in.

name: Atrophy: XCIX
description: Atrophy: XCIX is a first person action horror adventure that takes place in an abandoned hospital in the north of England. You will play as a high ranking officer supervising a patrol on the outskirts of a small town.

name: Chango
description: A Mystery. Someone is killing everyone. They talk about Chango. Will you be able to solve the mystery?

name: Pokémon Blue Kaizo
description: Pokémon Blue Kaizo is a ridiculously difficult ROM hack of Pokémon Blue which, as the title implies, was inspired by the like of Platform Hell hacks such as Kaizo Mario World. Everything about the game, including the wild Pokémon, the teams of trainers and gym leaders, and even the layouts, has been changed to make the game a much more difficult experience.

name: Josei no Hinkaku Juku DS
description: Sin descripción

name: Chou Kowai Hanashi DS: Ao no Shou
description: The developer Alchemist gathers together a total of 63 scary stories and bulks them up into visual novels filled with images, sound effects, and narration from Akira Hirayama.

name: 10 voor Taal
description: For many years, the '10 for Language 'game show in the Netherlands and Flanders has become a real crowd puller, with an average of 700,000 viewers per episode. Now young and old can test their language skills themselves with 10 for language on Nintendo DS and PC. In addition to the well-known TV game design, the game contains many new, challenging game variants, guaranteed for hours of fun. 10 Voor Taal consists of various parts. So you have to guess words based on different cryptic descriptions or point out the error in a sentence. In the different available game modes you have to compete for points or time. This is often more difficult than you would initially think. 10 for Language can also be played with several people via a wireless connection. That offers more than enough possibilities to test your knowledge of the Dutch language.

name: 1000 Bornes: Coups-Fourres et Courses Folles!
description: Discover the famous card game 1000 Bornes on DS updated with some new features. The title features a "classic" mode with the same rules as the original but also a "special" mode with delightful mini-games to counter your opponent's attacks using the stylus and microphone. A single cartridge holds up to six players.

name: 1001 Crosswords
description: Full of teasing crosswords from the UK’s leading national newspapers, this new collection contains an incredible 1001 puzzles of all levels of difficulty; enough for even the most determined crossword fanatic to get their teeth in to. Featuring a combination of Quick and Cryptic crosswords, 1001 Crosswords offers something for everyone. Take the hot seat and challenge a friend in a timed crossword duel! Use the inbuilt keyboard or write your own letters using the stylus. And if you’re really stuck, why not try the Hint button? But watch out for the time penalty! Everyone from the keenest puzzle fan to novices will find puzzles that challenge, confound and enlighten. So snuggle up on the sofa, turn off the phone, put the kettle on and get ready to dive into the biggest collection of crosswords that has ever been published on Nintendo DS!

name: 11 Card Games
description: It's game night in the house and what is more suitable for a social round than a well-maintained card game? After all, the game variants that make a 32-card stack possible, are almost immeasurable! But what if you feel like a well-groomed game, but neither teammates nor cards are in the house? What if you only have your Nintendo DS available instead? Do not worry, Rondomedia has an incredible solution for this incredible case! "11 card games" is the name of the miracle module, which in its memory not four, not seven, not nine, but an incredible 11 card games houses! What can go wrong in the face of this unexpected magnitude?

name: 1500 DS Spirits: Mahjong V
description: 1500DS Spirits: Mahjong V (widely used English translation. Original name is "1500 DS spirits: 麻雀V") is a Japan exclusive mahjong game. It is part of a large series of Nintendo DS titles which focus on table games all labeled 1500DS Spirits and created and published by Tasuke Co. Ltd.. This game is a special addition version of 1500DS Spirits: Vol 1 Mahjong and has extra added features compared to that game. This game used 1500DS Spirits: Vol 1 Mahjong as a base for this game so it has some similarities to this game including borrowed modes and assets.

name: 1500 DS Spirits: Shogi V
description: 1500DS Spirits: Mahjong V (widely used English translation. Original name is "1500 DS spirits: 麻雀V") is a Japan exclusive mahjong game. It is part of a large series of Nintendo DS titles which focus on table games all labeled 1500DS Spirits and created and published by Tasuke Co. Ltd.. This game is a special addition version of 1500DS Spirits: Vol 1 Mahjong and has extra added features compared to that game. This game used 1500DS Spirits: Vol 1 Mahjong as a base for this game so it has some similarities to this game including borrowed modes and assets.

name: Akagawa Jirou Mystery: Yasoukyoku - Hon ni Manekareta Satsujin
description: This adventure game is adapted from Akagawa Jirou's classic mystery novel Yasoukyoku – Hon ni Manekaereta Satsujin (Nocturne – Books that beckon murder) that contains two separate detective stories. The stage is set in Nonomiya Library, a mansion hidden amongst the trees in a darkened forest where a collection of books related to death are stored.

name: Master Blaster
description: You are the pilot of a Federation Clearance Ship and it's your job to make sure the Space Lanes between Pluto and Mercury are clear from asteroids (reduced in size when shot), alien ships and shooting stars. You must clear three sectors for each planet in the Solar System before attempting to dock with the Factory Ship. The game is viewed from above your ship with the whole sector shown on screen. You can turn your ship left and right as well as thrust forward and you must shoot anything that moves on the screen. Once a sector is cleared you must enter a gate to move to the next one.

name: Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island
description:
Shiren the Wanderer and his companion, Koppa the talking ferret, return for an all-new roguelike dungeon crawling adventure on Serpentcoil Island! After receiving a vision of a mysterious girl held captive by a terrible monster, Shiren and Koppa make their way to Serpentcoil Island—a distant isle rumored to be the lost stronghold of treasure hoarding pirates. Determined to rescue the girl and find the treasure, the two race into danger… only to be soundly defeated, like all the others who tried before.

Undeterred, Shiren and Koppa vow to challenge the monster again in order to save the mysterious girl. To brave the many dangers that await them, Shiren and Koppa must traverse complex dungeons filled with hostile monsters, hidden traps, and useful items. All the gear and experience Shiren accumulates will be lost if he collapses during exploration, so beware of rushing in unprepared! Rescue the mysterious girl and uncover the mystery that clouds Serpentcoil Island!

name: Free Gear
description:
Freegear is a pseudo 3D racing game. The player must compete in five tournaments against seven other drivers to ultimately win the world championship. In total, 20 unique races can be played in various weather conditions and environments.

The car is driven in a third person perspective and can be upgraded to improve its steering, acceleration, maximum speed and nitro power.

name: Wounded Summer Baby
description: Sin descripción

name: Amateur Action: Super Fishing
description: Grab your rod and visit many beautiful fishing locations. Try and catch all 68 different types of fish and become the supreme fisherman. Use your gained money to buy new equipment in the hope of landing the Big One.

name: Shattered Paradise
description: Shattered Paradise is an expansion for Tiberian Sun on OpenRA, its goal is to (im)balance the game by adding new factions (Mutants, C.A.B.A.L. and Scrin) and reworking the original sides, all of this to create a game a little more varied and balanced than TS.

name: Red Alert: A Path Beyond
description: Red Alert: A Path Beyond is a freeware game based on the W3D engine as was used in Command & Conquer: Renegade which aims to transform the first Red Alert game into a first/third person shooter.

name: Tiberian Sun: Reborn
description: Utilizing the classic W3D Sage engine that powers the iconic Command & Conquer: Renegade, Tiberian Sun: Reborn is a standalone full-conversion platform that offers first-person shooter action in the Tiberian Sun universe.

name: Froot Loops: Black Beak's Treasure Cove
description: Run, jump and fly from level to level to find the clues Black Beak has left for Toucan Sam's nephews!

name: Double Dragon Collection
description:
Twin dragons rise again... in one complete package!
Six classic Double Dragon titles, including the long-awaited Double Dragon Advance, as well as Super Double Dragon, ported for the first time since its original release!

This bundle is a physical only release planned for the Nintendo Switch in Asia.
The ports of Double Dragon Advance and Super Double Dragon will be available separately on additional platforms.

name: Monotonia: First Contact
description: Monotonia: First Contact is a prologue-format experience, free and essential to pave the challenging and definitive cycle of MONOTONY. Work, pay your bills, and survive!

name: Devil Engine: Complete Edition
description:
Lightning Strikes Again! Take control of the AI ship Andraste and blast through hordes to destroy the Devil Engine!

Devil Engine is a high-octane, classic-styled side-scrolling shoot-em-up heavily influenced by the best in the genre from the 32-bit era, featuring a variety of incredible locations, hand-drawn pixel art, and a blood-pumping soundtrack that brings the dark future to life.

name: Angel Whisper: The Suspense Visual Novel Left Behind by a Game Creator.
description:
This is the last work of a certain game creator who mysteriously disappeared. The cross reality ADV, known for its shocking conclusion.
"Angel Whisper", released by Child-Dream in 1999, became a major topic of conversation with its system of playing the posthumous game while browsing actual websites, raising the question, "Did this really happen?".

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sora no Kiseki the 3rd Kai - HD Edition
description: A remaster of the PSP version of the third installment in the series, serving as a direct sequel to the events of the previous installment and the ending to the Liberl arc, with enhanced graphics, cross-save with the PSP version and extras like PS3 themes, music, calendars and more. The game follows Kevin Graham and Ries Argent in their quest to retrieve an ancient artifact for the Septian Church.

name: Warcher Defenders
description:
A tiny castle defense action RPG with a very unique and challenging gameplay!

Fight for survival in this unique twist on Castle Defense!! Trigger special attacks to destroy the enemy hordes and protect your tower against tons of different boss encounters in this Old School, Retro Classic!

name: SMW2+3: The Essence Star
description:
After shipwrecking in a strange land, Mario is on the journey to collect the five shards of the Essence Star– said to benefit the world through people's actions. If it falls into the hands of evil-doers, though...

SMW2+3: The Essence Star is an advanced romhack featuring detailed storytelling, a shop system, and several surprises!

name: Mega Mario World: Another Universe
description:
A hack for Super Mario World with 59 exits

Features:
-8 worlds
-saturated levels (perfect if you hate lineal and empity levels)
-some open levels, you can explore like a super mario 64 2D, find the stars!
-introducted many gameplay sprites like the fluud of SML2 submarine
-custom exgfx on levels and ow
-status bar enhanced

name: Super Mario Kart Reversed
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario World: A Super Mario Adventure
description:
A 50 exit hack made by KaidenThelens in like 2 months.

Standard, Not to hard. If you can beat Super Mario World you can probably beat this.

name: 500 Caliber Contractz
description: 500 Caliber Contractz is a momentum-based 3D-Platformer in which you play as a contract killer hired via crowdfunding to murder CEOs, Disgraced Sinister Ex-Doctors, Private-Prison-Owning DJs, etc. With your handy high caliber sniper rifle and a chest full of anxiety, you can and will propel yourself to where you need to be. Collect tokens that float around for a reason I haven't bothered coming up with and then murder your target. Do it. Please.

name: Ninja World
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja World 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja World 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Romancing Mario
description: Sin descripción

name: Panic in the Mushroom Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: GeoHub
description: GeoHub is a free and open source geography guessing game using Google Streetview to place you in a random location and you have to guess where you think you are in the world.

name: Aquarius Baseball: Genkai no, Sono Saki e.
description: A promotional game for Coca Cola's Aquarius line of sports drinks. Released exclusively in Japan and given to contest winners.

name: Der Bauernhof
description: Der Bauernhof is a Simulation game, developed by Entwicklerteam Slaby and published by Astragon Software, which was released in Europe in 2009.

name: Bibi & Tina: Das grosse Reiterfest
description: The first great Wii game for all horse lovers! Here the dream of horseback riding comes true and thanks to the child-friendly controls and age-appropriate level design, fast-paced fun is guaranteed for young and old. Versatility and activity are in demand! A big riding festival is being organized at the Martinshof and of course a lot of help is needed to test the riding games and competition courses. In this way, users can prove on different riding courses that they are firmly in the saddle and are ahead of the game when riding. It's also about jumping on the trampoline, throwing cans, decorating cakes, balancing, feeding ducks and throwing horseshoes - because only the best get hold of the golden horseshoes, with which all tracks and horses can be unlocked.

name: Clever Kids: Creepy Crawlies
description: "Hi, I'm Sprocket.... Join me on a journey to meet some of the slimiest, squirmiest, wriggliest creatures on earth. From the tiniest insects to huge bettles, giant centipedes and deadly spiders, you'll learn everything you need to become a master of creepy-crawly knowledge!" - Play a host of Fun games: help a dung beetle, defend a garden against centipedes and spiders, solve jigsaws, beat the Quiz and much more! - Clever Kids games make learning and development Fun For all ages.

name: Country Dance: 30 Chart-topping Hits!!!
description: An edition of the original Country Dance for Wii with five bonus songs.

name: Crazy Chicken Carnival
description: Crazy Chicken Carnival is a party game starring Crazy Chicken and friends set on a fair with more than 25 different attractions/mini-games to play. Crazy Chicken had expected to meet his friends at the yearly fair, but his friends are nowhere to be found. It appears they are kidnapped by an evil wizards and his underlings who also brought the fair under their control. Now you have battle the evil wizards and his underlings on the fairs attractions to save your friends. Attractions include a 'test your strength' machine, knife throwing, bowling, a fish pond and ball throwing tent. The DS version is a single player game while the Wii version can be played with up to four players.

name: Crazy Quiz! Are You Crazy Enough?
description: The combination of quiz show and party games on Wii. Combine up to four players in a colorful 3D TV studio. There are eight animated and customizable player characters to choose from. Accompanied by the moderator Max, Answer many quiz questions and complete exciting mini-games in an impressive environment. More than 1,800 questions in nine different subject areas. Features: Real studio environment in a 3D TV studio with presenter Max. Unique player characters, each with four different outfits that can be activated in the course of the game. Different multiplayer and single player game modes. Wide range of entertainment with quizzes and mini games for the whole family.

name: Galileo Mystery: The Crown of Midas
description: Stephan took a job as a night watchmen in a museum, but the adventure of his life begins just a few minutes after he arrives! A mysterious boss, cryptic exhibits and dangerous intruders; he will need all his wits about him if he and his friend Jessica are to make it through the night… Features: •Detailed environment in a mysterious museum with several different locations •Exiting story with tricky puzzles •Play both Stephan and Jessica and combine the actions of both to solve puzzles •Several minigames loosen up the typical explore-and-answer-questions-experience of adventure games (rebuild a dinosaur skeleton, chess-like game with queens only, pointing/balancing game with mirror) •A built-in help system will enable the player to finish the game completely instead of getting lost and frustrated halfway through the game

name: Just Dance 2: Extra Songs
description:
A special limited edition of Just Dance 2 featuring new songs and routines. Features 21 tracks previously only available via download, plus two exclusive tracks.

Just Dance 2: Extra Songs track list includes:

A Band of Bees – Chicken Payback
Blur – Song 2
Carl Douglas – Kung fu fighting ( Dave Ruffy / Mark Wallis remix)
Estelle feat Kanye West – American Boy
Katy Perry – Firework
M/A/R/R/S – Pump Up The Volume
Panic At The Disco – Nine in the afternoon
Rihanna – Pon De Replay
Steppenwolf – Born To Be Wild
The Supremes – You Can’t Hurry Love
V V Brown – Crying Blood
Countdown Dee’s Hit Explosion – Barbie Girl
Love Letter – Why oh why
Nick Phoenix and Thomas Bergersen – Professor Pumplestickle
Studio Allstars – Maniac
Sweat Invaders – Skin-to-Skin
The Hit Crew – Here Comes The Hotstepper
The Lemon Cubes – Mambo NO. 5 (A Little Bit Of Monica)
The Lemon Cubes – Moving On Up
The Reverend Horatio Duncan & Amos Sweets – Down By The Riverside
The World Cup Girls – Futebol Crazy

Plus two exclusive tracks:

A R Rahman, Pussycat Dolls featuring Nicole Scherzinger – Jai Ho! (You are my destiny)
Sweat Invaders – Funkytown’

name: Maratón
description:
Mexico's most beloved trivia game!

Have fun and learn, either alone or with friends, answering questions of general interest.

name: Darts Wii DX
description: Enjoy authentic darts with Darts Wii DX (ダーツWii DX). Grasp the Wii remote by holding the darts arrow and swing the Wii remote toward the screen. You can experience a realistic darts game like throwing darts. The game has five modes: zero one, cricket, cut throat, count up, and rotation. In addition, there is a free throw mode where you can practice freely. Nintendo Wi-Fi connection allows you to participation and browsing of national ranking.

name: Puke the Pirate
description:
Help Puke the Pirate run, jump, puke, and fart-fly his way through many levels of adventure!
Collect as much of Black Barf's treasure as you can!

name: De Ontdekker en het mysterie van de Diamanten Scarabee
description: De Ontdekker en het mysterie van de Diamanten Scarabee you play the role of Ben the Archaeologist who is searching for the Temple of the Diamond Scarab. Once he is in the temple he meets Tiri, an enchanting Egyptian princess. Going through a maze of underground passages they look for ancient Egyptian treasures and confront various challenges. The Guardian leads them step by step to the exit. The game is played on a Balance Board, a standard Wii accessory. With this you can move through the maze, find treasures and enter challenging situations. Since this is the first game in the world developed jointly for visually impaired, blind and fully sighted children, the game can be played in Dutch and in English.

name: Die drei???: Das verfluchte Schloss
description: A new case leads Jupiter, Peter and Bob to an abandoned castle where a ghost is up to mischief. But the three detectives soon discover that there is much more to this spooky story than initially assumed - The new Wii game will be released in spring 2009 to coincide with the start of the new feature film by the cult detectives, "The Three ??? - The Cursed Castle". can replay Wii. The exciting location Schloss offers numerous partially hidden rooms to explore and many tricky puzzles and exciting tasks to solve. Quick reactions, knowledge and logical thinking are required to solve the mystery.

name: Family Challenge Wii
description: Family Challenge Wii is a Sports game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Family Jockey
description: Family Jockey (ファミリージョッキー) is a party race game that can be easily played by a large number of people with easy operation by anyone from children to adults. By shaking the Wii remote and the nunchuk as a rein, you can accelerate the horse or hit the whip to make it drastically dash, and you can feel the jockey feeling. A variety of courses such as “Oval”, “Nangoku Resort”, “Western”, etc. are waiting for the jockey, and many unique horses that can be selected according to the player's preference will appear, so you can enjoy playing as many times as you like receive. In various battle modes where up to four players can participate, you can also use “Mii” to play races with family and friends.

name: Family Quiz
description: Family Quiz on Wii is an exciting quiz game with board game elements and minigames, packed with several thousand questions on a wide variety of topics! Quiz questions on a wide variety of topics such as history, politics, physics, chemistry, mathematics, general knowledge, geography, biology and sport, some of which are accompanied by picture puzzles and video clips. Three different multiplayer modes and a Survivor mode for solo players are ready to challenge one to four players. The questions are divided into three age categories so that the whole family can join in the fun. Mini-games involving coordination and skill provide a change of pace and add to the overall excitement! A detailed highscore provides hours of gaming fun and motivation to play over and over again!

name: Fantastic Football Fan Party
description: Get ready for a Fantastic Football Fan Party and explore the excellent party fun based around the beautiful game and its fans. Battle for countless trophies and bragging rights…right in the middle of your living room! Create your own player, in any style you like. Unlock countless additional funky items to pimp up your character! Become a lightning quick winger…or an outstanding acrobatic goal scorer. Get the crowd pumped by drumming them into a frenzy! Show off your extraordinary ball juggling skills, score unbelievable goals in a fast-paced shoot out and dodge crazed fans as you celebrate your victory! Have your own Fantastic Football Fan Party at home and show how football you are! Key Features: - Experience 10 fun-filled party games based around the beautiful game and ist fans! - Create your own player, in any style you like. - Unlock countless additional funky items to pimp up your character - Battle for countless trophies and bragging rights - Go crazy with multiplayer fun for up to four players - Enjoy excellent party fun for the whole family

name: Fort Boyard
description: Fort Boyard the TV show is now on Nintendo DS and Wii! Will you be able to challenge the 19 games to win the famous Boyard coins? The game features an adaptable level of difficulty and high-score saving for replayability.

name: Goal!
description:
Goal! is a soccer game from an angled overhead point of view, with the screen scrolling to follow the action.

You play with a full team of 11 players, each one rated in 7 different skill categories. You can match them against a team controlled by the computer or another player. You can even team up with a friend and match your combined skills against the best computer team.

Several game modes are available, including tournament mode, world cup mode, and a goal shooting competition.

name: PolyBoy War
description: Sin descripción

name: Manakoto Hitomi no Bawai
description: Sin descripción

name: Walls
description: Slava is an ordinary guy living in a shabby socket. Well, like living, existing. He has lost all his dreams, and now he has one task - not to live until dawn. But before that you need to write a will...

name: The Dead Zone
description: The soldiers who survived the disaster. In a world that has turned into apocalypse, explore those challenging death zones, and in order to defend the continuation of human civilization, kill all those ugly monsters! Lead the survivors to survive in this disaster.

name: Animalia
description: As the next leader of your people, you visit the Summit, a meeting of world leaders. Your parents, the King and Queen, demand you find a marriage proposal while your here. Choose your mate and get swept away in the adventure of your courtship. Your choices will change the outcome of your life.

name: Der Gesundheitscoach
description: Der Gesundheitscoach is a health and fitness game released in Europe for the Nintendo Wii.

name: Th3-M15 Guild
description: Deadly missions for a deadly group! TH3-M15 Guild is a bullet hell survival game with rogue-lite elements. Undertake assignments, fighting off against armies of robots and creatures alike. Use an arsenal of unique skills, weapons, and items! Do you have what it takes to finish the job, mercenary?

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Pack - Soviet Invasion of Poland
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Amygdala
description: Welcome to the world of Amygdala. Multiple nightmares await you.

name: Aladdin of the Forsaken Lands
description: Experience a fantastical take on the classic Arabian Nights tale! Using the classic ATB (Active Time Battle) combat system, six adventurers will travel across sand dunes and past colossal sandworms to uncover a treasure which may save their kingdom.

name: A Fool's Art Gallery
description: A Fool's Art Gallery contains over 20 years of visual content by one mushroom cultist Canadian artist. You are a flying magical mask who s*!*s stars; be sure to look for secret doors to reveal hidden content as you explore the gallery at large. Hundreds of works of art await you!

name: Aboleo: Shadow of the Crown
description: Immerse yourself in 'Shadow of the Crown,' an RPG where the line between heroism and darkness blurs. Step into the enigmatic role of a charismatic figure, torn between conquering or saving a kingdom. Shape its destiny through trust or chaos. Your choices wield the power to define its fate.

name: Animal Trail Girlish Square 2
description: Idol fan and manager, Nakamori Taiga and the girls are back in this latest installment! Animal Trail ☆ Girlish Square is gaining momentum and have a chance to reach stardom in the upcoming Tokyo New Idol Festival. The stage is set: it’s time to kick things off with another roar!

name: Angry Choice
description: Angry Choice is 2D game with a side view, where you control a girl with a gun, fighting with monsters, which are also armed and dangerous, but no less dangerous and the world itself, which conceals traps of varying degrees of danger, challenge this mysterious world!

name: Animal Trail Girlish Square Love+Plus
description: Idol otaku, Nakamori Taiga and the girls of idol group Animal Trail ☆ Girlish Square are back in this series of side stories featuring Haneru and Tetora!

name: Apocalipse Maromba
description: Apocalipse Maromba is a quick 2D platform shooter game inspired by memes from the Brazilian bodybuilding and fitness universe, with its main objective on making the player smile! This is a parody that combines comedy, bodybuilding, and fun, without using real names, images, or brands.

name: Arouse
description: Ignite your passion and explore a world of lust and desire. Create a character from your wildest dreams and fulfill your deepest fantasies with a realistic sex simulator. It's time to get aroused!

name: Asagos
description: - 1916: The Canadian Parliament - As the Great War incites fear and suspicion, lead an investigation into the heart of Canada's government. But beware of who you trust. What lies within the depths casts a shadow upon the stars themselves.

name: Bewitching Sinners
description: Bewitching Sinners is a dark comedy dating sim where your choices will either leave you with a your own witch-hunting man or ruin a whole world and potentially killing millions of people within it, no pressure! Explore a fantasy world full of witches, hot priests, and maybe some run-ins with death.

name: Black Heaven: A Necromantic Dating Sim
description: A dark fantasy dating sim where you collect the ghosts of your former classmates! Make your choices carefully--every time you try to undo the past, you risk slipping into madness.

name: Bloodkill
description: Brutal First Person Shooter focused on action, speed, gore and blood-pumping metal music.

name: Blue Ribbon Bake Off
description: Blue Ribbon Bake Off is a new, original playing card game. Players work to gather ingredients to complete a recipe and win a blue ribbon at the county fair. Competitors use every trick in the cookbook to stop them. Who will be named the County's Best Baker?

name: Bomb Crossing
description: The monster has captured the maids. Dear brothers, please act urgently! Use bombs as weapons to blow up all the monsters guarding you to save these lovely maids.

name: Hasbro Family Game Night: Fun Pack
description: A bundle featuring Family Game Night 2 and 3.

name: WoofChat
description: Unleash your creativity in a customizable online nightclub. Be anyone, chat with other captivating players. Play on PC, iOS, Android—anywhere, anytime!

name: Wild Sex: Wet Girls
description: Welcome to the captivating world of the game WILD SEX: WET GIRLS! Immerse yourself in the thrilling setting of the Wild West, where you face the most dangerous challenge - survival in a world overrun by zombies

name: Wicked Times
description: The demon Kugraltha has risen again and sent his minions to occupy the lands. Embark on a journey to stop them in this RPG hero manager/autobattler. Collect gold. Upgrade your equipment. Find new towns and activities that give you extra experience and gold along the way.

name: Whispers in Paradise
description: "Whispers in Paradise" delves into the mysterious and supernatural journey of Emily and Sydney. When Emily's life takes an unexpected turn, her friend Sydney becomes determined to uncover the secrets lurking within Emily's haunted mansion. Exploring mansion's past, Sydney find a chilling revelation.

name: Wet Girls
description: Wet Girls is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Vorum
description: Vorum is a retro-inspired RPG with elements of noir, horror, investigation, and science fiction. Its narrative is somewhat inspired by recent events in humanity, with touches of philosophy. It's a post-apocalyptic world with problems similar to our own.

name: Unoxi
description: Explore a disparate ruin gripped between the jaws of the universe. Reawaken forgotten knowledge in this twist on a classic sokoban puzzler.

name: The Firm
description: A Tactical Turn Based VR Gunfest. Translating classical turn-based mechanics into VR. 48 physics-based weapons to choose from. 16 levels and lots of foes with their own abilities and armament. Many destructible objects.

name: Hasbro Family Game Night Value Pack
description: A bundle containing Hasbro Family Game Night 1 and 2.

name: Train Simulator: Zhengxi Highspeed: Zhengzhou - Sanmenxia Route
description: Experience exhilarating Chinese high-speed rail operations with the Zhengxi passenger line from SimTech Vision for Train simulator.

name: Horse & Pony: My Riding Stables
description: The riding stable at the old mill is going to shine with a new gleam: the condition of the riding hall is alarming, there's a draught in the stall and no one wants to live in the guest house. But that's all in the past, because now you've arrived and are bringing your worst rivals to the edge of despair. Stall, riding hall and guest house will be renovated and soon you'll have enthusiastic guests who are happy to pay for their stay. With the proceeds build a new breeding stall, and soon the first foals will be frolicking with their mothers on the heath. Later you train the foals with the longe and can sell them to interested parties whom you trust. Horse owners will also be happy to call on your services for massages for their four-legged friends. Your own horse is also in the stall and loves to go on exciting rides through the woods, on the beach and in the mountains. Once you've trained enough, you can participate in numerous cross-country races, and each Sunday you can win a cup! Show your rivals that by living with horses a dream can come true!

name: Hula Wii: Tanoshiku Hula wo Odorou!!
description: This fitness game has players using the Wii remote controller to hula dance to various songs. Videos of professional hula dancers provide guidance to help players learn. In addition to standard hula dancing, it also features Tahitian dance. A two-player mode lets two players dance together to the same song. Unlike the first game, this entry only supports the Wii remote and doesn't support the balance board.

name: Brave New World

name: International Athletics
description: Accurate representations of 14 events: 100m, Long Jump, Shot Put, High Jump, 400m, 110m Hurdles, Discus, Pole Vault, Javelin, 1500m, Hammer, Running Target Rifle Shooting, Rapid Fire Pistol Shooting and Archery. Superior control system and character animation, and truly competitive A.I. Hugely detailed international stadiums, including venues in Canada, France, Japan, Spain and China. Single-player Decathlon, Tournament and Quick Event modes, and multiplayer modes for 2-4 players. Beat personal bests and world records, accumulate medals and earn trophies to unlock extra events and tournaments! Create your own customised male or female athlete with their own distinctive attributes. Hugely popular genre featuring intuitive Wii Remote and Nunchuk controls for instantly replayable, hugely compelling gameplay, mirroring the real events.

description:
Jinsei Game Wii (人生ゲームWii) is a board game which was released in Japan in 2007.
It is based on the Japanese version of the US game "The Game of Life". An upgraded version, Jinsei Game Wii EX, was released later on.

You can also earn achievement bonuses for successive generations. In Okama Masu, events related to players other than yourself happen. With the mass that involves other people, I can not get rid of myself if it is not my own turn.
